Projects

  • Study the types of neural cell in tumor microenvironment through deconvolution methods, decoding information from bulk RNA-seq data Preparing to start

    This project prepare for using several sets of scRNA-seq or snRNA-seq data across different brain region to evaluate the impact of annotation data on deconvolution. The optimized annotation input strategy will be used to calculate BGM bulk RNA-seq samples and a variety of brain metastasis samples to analysis types of neural cell and its profiles in tumor microenvironment.

  • Entropy Weight Ensemble in variants auto-interpretation Finished

    This project integrated the results from Xrare, Examiner, and deepPVP, utilizing entropy-weighted method, to devise an improved analysis approach utilizing actual clinical data to semi-automatically ranking genetic mutations for a broad spectrum of disorders. The objective is to expedite the molecular diagnosis in genome/exome sequencing.

  • Cleaning clinical raw data Modular

    Some scripts about extract information from sever and a vast array of pdf or word files

  • Interneuron E-type classification Refactoring

    The first bioinformatics project, bad organization scripts

Gallery

  • 长白山滑雪 New

    疫情解封之后的第一次旅行，滑雪没想象的难，除了被人从后边撞了一下摔了，自己滑完全没摔，感觉很棒

  • 日本之行

    本科毕业旅行, 第一次出国

  • 嵊泗跳岛游-徒步，露营

    体验感最强，最累，钱花的最少的一次旅行

  • 柏林之行

    攻略做的最详细的一次，玩的很满足

  • 郴州行

    郴州体验什么叫网红景点，还好莽山还可以

  • 大围山的星空

    上山那天大雾，本以为无望看到星空，没想到午夜雾散，第一次拍到星轨和流星，碰巧当天生日，非常棒的生日礼物

  • 苏杭，乌镇，周庄一路玩回家

    旅行时间最长的一次旅行，在周庄外的白蚬湖，拍到了至今为止，拍到过的最美日落

  • 泰山-长岛游

    第一次知道生蚝能够如此便宜，感受到渔民的淳朴实在, 也被师姐的体力和恢复力震撼到了

  • 体验台风，搞笑的“赶海”

    赶在台风登陆在外面吃火锅，体验了台风的强悍，吹坏了两把伞，离谱的“赶海”，满载而归的出海打鱼

  • 浅游成都

    趁着开会顺便游了成都，时间比较短，也没做攻略就跟着玩，似乎是吃也吃了个“假成都”，以后有机会一定要再去好好深度游，四姑娘山都念了好多年了
